attributes.action: Remove foreign aid for any countries that do business with Russia
attributes.additional_details: It is not right that we reward those who side with the aggressor in this illegal war
attributes.background: The UK government should remove foreign aid from all the countries that continue to do business with Russia while it is still in ukraine. Pakistan is a prime example but heir are others who receive our money every year

rejection.details:
We understand you want the UK to stop giving foreign aid to certain countries, however we're not sure what you mean by what actions to "do business with Russia" would mean countries lost foreign aid.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
